price: (7) Already the word [i.e., decree] has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe.
arabic: لَقَدۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: laqad ḥaqqa al-qawlu ʿalā aktharihim fahum lā yu'minūna
